scene.scenemanager



class SceneManager: scene.actorcontainer.ActorContainer;
Stores and manages all Actors.

this(PhysicsEngine physics_engine);
Construct the SceneManager; set up update frequency.

Params:
PhysicsEngine physics_engine Physics engine for the actor manager to use.

void die();
Destroy the SceneManager.

real time_step();
Get frame length in seconds, i.e. update "frame" length, not graphics.

real game_time();
Get time when the current update started, in game time.

void time_speed(real speed);
Set time speed multiplier (0 for pause, 1 for normal speed).

real time_speed();
Get time speed multiplier.

void update();
Update the actor manager.

void draw(VideoDriver driver);
Draw all actors.

Params:
VideoDriver driver Video driver to draw with.

void clear();
Remove all actors.

string statistics();
Return a string with statistics about SceneManager run.

void add_actor(Actor actor);
Add a new actor. Will be added at the beginning of next frame.

Note:
this should only be used by actor constructor.

Params:
Actor actor Actor to add. Must not already be in the SceneManager.

void remove_actor(Actor actor);
Remove an actor. Will be removed at the beginning of next frame.

Note:
this should only be used by actor die() or destructor.

Params:
Actor actor Actor to remove. Must be in the SceneManager.
